source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAPERSON_000_220<tab>No, this will not do. No, no. Not if the righteous are to rise triumphant.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAPERSON_000_220<tab>Sie ist<var 1D /var>... noch zu schwach<var 1D /var>... Die Kraft<var 1D /var>... das Böse zu richten<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAPERSON_000_221<tab>Where art thou, O bearer promised? Hand worthy to wield the blade. Just and true...
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAPERSON_000_221<tab>Ich brauche<var 1D /var>... Hilfe<var 1D /var>... Jemanden<var 1D /var>... mit reinem Herzen<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_230<tab>By all means, convince me I'm wrong. Tell me there's a way.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_230<tab>Es ist zum Verrücktwerden! Gibt es denn keinen Weg, wie wir ihn benutzen können?

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_231<tab>A “bearer just and true,” if the accounts are to be believed.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_231<tab>Laut Prophezeiung braucht es jemanden mit reinem Herzen.

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_232<tab>How wonderfully subjective. So one with such qualities would be judged worthy and therefore be in no danger? Simple as that?
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_232<tab>Das kann doch nicht so schwer sein.

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_233<tab>(-Galuf-)As if anything about this is simple. We already know that prolonged exposure places the bearer's very soul at hazard. By the time the others even realized, the eikon had already prevailed.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_233<tab>(-Junger Galuf-)Oh doch. Bei fortwährender Anwendung verliert der Benutzer nämlich allmählich den Verstand. Und eh man sichs versieht, wird er zu einem Kriegsgott.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_234<tab>War ja klar, dass die Sache einen Haken hat.

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_235<tab>Then until we can conceive of a method to completely and utterly starve it of aether, we can but maintain the status quo. Vexing as it is.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_235<tab>Wenn es uns nicht gelingt, den Äther irgendwie zu fördern, stecken wir fest.

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_236<tab>In so doing we merely pass our problems to the next generation. Sever the streams, “seal” it away─our every measure can be defeated. All our progress, reversed...
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGK_000_236<tab>Und selbst wenn es klappt: Das Siegel wird nicht ewig halten. Wir müssten den Prozess schon umkehren können.

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_237<tab>Bah. Who would've thought that aether could be so damn hard to manipulate?
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGD_000_237<tab>Es muss doch irgendeine Möglichkeit geben, Äther im großen Stil abzuleiten.

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_238<tab>(-Galuf-)Sever the streams... Bah, that won't do. Alter? No...
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGZ_000_239<tab>Galuf's got that look again. Any moment now he'll be saying...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_241<tab>(-Galuf-)My friends, victory is not beyond us. There is a simple method by which we may yet “reverse” our fortunes. To wit, we reverse the flow!
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_EUREKAYOUNGG_000_241<tab>(-Junger Galuf-)Ich glaube, ich weiß, wie es klappen kann. Wir müssen den Fluss einfach umkehren!

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>The masked man is nowhere to be found. However, you spy a small object near where last you saw him...
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA2EVENTSHROUDED_00502_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>Dort, wo der geheimnisvolle Mann gekniet hat, liegt etwas auf dem Boden.
